at.qe.sepm.skeleton.ui.beans

Class SessionInfoBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.qe.sepm.skeleton.ui.beans.SessionInfoBean

  • @Component
 @Scope(value="session")
public class SessionInfoBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Session information bean to retrieve session-specific parameters.
    Author:
    Michael Brunner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SessionInfoBean() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User getCurrentUser()
      Returns the currently logged on user, null if no user is authenticated for this session.
      java.lang.String getCurrentUserName()
      Returns the username of the user for this session, empty string if no user has been authenticated for this session.
      java.lang.String getCurrentUserRoles()
      Returns the roles of the user for this session as space-separated list, empty string if no user has been authenticated for this session-
      boolean hasRole(java.lang.String role)
      Checks if the user for this session has the given role (c.f.
      boolean isLoggedIn()
      Checks if a user is authenticated for this session.

        public java.lang.String getCurrentUserRoles()

        Returns:

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        Checks if a user is authenticated for this session.
        Returns:
        true if a non-anonymous user has been authenticated, false otherwise

      • hasRole

        public boolean hasRole(java.lang.String role)
        Checks if the user for this session has the given role (c.f. UserRole).
        Parameters:
        role - the role to check for as string
        Returns:
        true if a user is authenticated and the current user has the given role, false otherwise
